entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers at times heavy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending before morning then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
